catalogue_raissonne: Geiser 198 (as printed with another image on left side of the sheet, before lettering); Bloch 131 (right half only).
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: horse at center grazing; female figure at R with arm over horse's mane and PL hand on its head, looking across horse at male figure dressed as acrobat who is leaning against the horse looking back; Ex Libris written across top
image_copyright: © Estate Pablo Picasso %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription

-- titled in plate at top: [EX-LIBRIS], and with this monogram: [MP]
-- inscribed in plate at bottom: [pour mon ami Max Pellequer]
-- in graphite on verso, lower right: [D]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; given to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in plate, lower left: Picasso
title: Ex-Libris for Max Pellequer
